alert.note: Alert for Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 5:42PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 615 PM MST... At 542 PM MST, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Beardsley, or over Sun City West, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glendale, Peoria, Surprise, El Mirage, Youngtown, Sun City West, Sun City, Waddell, Surprise Stadium, Arrowhead Mall, Beardsley and Vistancia. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 133 and 147. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 14 and 17. AZ Route 303 between mile markers 111 and 130. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley
